    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • uiReadyTripIncident

        public static TripIncidentBuilder uiReadyTripIncident()
        Creates a new builder that will create a ui ready trip incident, with the following fields populated
        • Claim - if a claim is explicitly or implicitly specified, by using onClaim or creating this incident using withIncident on a claim or exposure, then the given claim will be used. Otherwise a brand new ui ready travel claim will be created
        • TripRU - will be set to refer to the first TripRU on the claim's policy, as ordered by risk unit number. If there is no TripRU on the claim's policy an IllegalStateException will be thrown when the incident is created
        • Description - will be set to a unique string of the form Description N, when N is a unique integer
        Returns:
        a new builder

      • withTripAccommodation

        public TripIncidentBuilder withTripAccommodation(TripAccommodation tripAccommodation)

      • withTripRU

        Returns:
        the modified builder

      • withFirstTripRU

        public TripIncidentBuilder withFirstTripRU()
        Sets the related risk unit for this incident to the first TripRU risk unit on the claim's policy. The TripRU risk units are ordered by risk unit number.
        Returns:
        the modified builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there are no TripRU risk units on the claim's policy

      • withTripSegment
